title: Prawn and pepper biryani
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons ghee or vegetable oil', '300g basmati rice', '2 tablespoons curry paste of your choice', '1 onion peeled and finely chopped', '1 red pepper, deseeded and sliced', '1 green pepper, deseeded and sliced', '600ml chicken stock (from a stock cube)', '1 grated zest of lemon, and half the juice', '100g frozen peas', '250g prawns', '2 tablespoons fresh coriander chopped (optional)', '50g Greek yoghurt', '1 teaspoon garlic puree', '1 teaspoon ginger']
